account.delete_account_paragraph: This will delete your account from monty esim app. You can always access your bought eSIM and activated profile through your phone
account.delete_account_confirmation: Please enter your email in order to confirm deleting your account

noDataFound.no_valid_iccid: No ICCID provided. Please provide a valid ICCID.
noDataFound.no_data_matching_iccid: No data available for the provided ICCID

bundle.bundle_existence_title: You have purchased an eSIM before!
bundle.bundle_existence_text: If you still have the SIM on your device and you will use it from here, it is faster to top it up!

orders.top_up_plan_text: Top up your plan now and benefit from its data and coverage
orders.consumption_details_text: This is your consumption rate till now
orders.share_your_bundle_text: Share your bundle with friends, family, or anyone you think might benefit from it
orders.please_wait_to_fetch_order: Please wait while we fetch your order details
orders.qrcode_sent_text: The QR code was sent to your email. You can scan it here and share it with your friends.

userGuide.place_qr_code: Place the QR code you’ve received inside the phone camera frame to scan the code
userGuide.go_mobile_data: Go back to Mobile Service and Select on Mobile Data Options
userGuide.toggle_data_roaming: Select the toggle button next to Data Roaming to turn the function on or off
userGuide.slide_two_fingers: Slide two fingers downwards starting from the top of the screen
userGuide.go_back_connections: Go back to Connections and Select Mobile networks

auth.verificationCodeSent: You're almost there! A verification code was sent to your email
